Summary: fuzzy white cloud in black sky changed to black triangle as it crossed in front of moom then back to fuzzy white cloud. Went from heading South to East.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy location is. Latitude = 33.3286, Longitude = -111.8063 My wife, neighbor lady and I were sitting in the drive way watching the "super moon" starting at 8:20 pm local time when about 8:50 pm something made me look up and I noticed a dim fuzzy white cloud like object moving from the North to South. I told my wife and neighbor lady to look up and we all watched a cloud moving rather fast with no sound or blinking lights like a plane has. The object then started a turn to the East and passed in front of the moon and we could see it change to solid black triangle. As it went past the moon it returned to a dim fuzzy white cloud and faded out of sight as it continued traveling East.
